## Description
The&nbsp;**Receive**** Content (HTTP)**&nbsp;task allows to receive the content to be processed by an on-demand application via HTTP.

> Note

This is the initial task of all on-demand workflows.&nbsp;

The output file generated by this task is named "origin".

## Configuration
![](data:image/png;base64,)

In the&nbsp;**Alias**&nbsp;field, enter the name of the task that will be displayed in the workflow.
